title: Ludovico Vaccari
text:
Ludovico Vaccari (born <a href="Rome">Roma</a>, 10 March 1998) is an Italian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player.
His usual position is as a <a href="Centre%20%28rugby%20union%29">Centre</a> and he currently plays for <a href="Fiamme%20Oro%20Rugby">Fiamme Oro</a> in <a href="Top12">Top12</a>. 
For <a href="2019%E2%80%9320%20Pro14">2019–20 Pro14</a> season, he named like "Permit Player" for <a href="Zebre">Zebre</a> in <a href="Pro%2014">Pro 14</a>.
In 2017, Vaccari was named in the <a href="Italy%20national%20under-20%20rugby%20union%20team">Italy Under 20</a> squad.
